versos: (moving) Acts 17:28 - "For in him we live and move and have our being.' As some of your own poets have said, 'We are his offspring.'";;;
(shaken) Psalm 62:2 - "He alone is my rock and my salvation, my fortress where I will never be shaken.";;;
(charity) 1 Corinthians 13:13 - "And now abideth faith, hope, charity, these three; but the greatest of these is charity.";;;
(partly) 1 Corinthians 13:12 - "For now we see through a glass, darkly; but then face to face: now I know in part; but then shall I know even as also I am known.";;;
(hittites) 2 Samuel 11:3 - "And David sent and inquired about the woman. And one said, 'Is not this Bathsheba, the daughter of Eliam, the wife of Uriah the Hittite'";;;
(exercise) 1 Timothy 4:8 - For physical training is of some value
(curious) Acts 17:21 - "Now all the Athenians and the foreigners living there would spend their time in nothing else but telling or hearing something new.";;;
(scorn) Proverbs 3:34 - "He mocks proud mockers but shows favor to the humble and oppressed.";;;
(scatter) Jeremiah 30:17 - But I will restore you to health and heal your wounds
(plain) Matthew 7:28 - "When Jesus had finished saying these things, the crowds were amazed at his teaching,";;;
(moment) 2 Corinthians 4:17 - "For our momentary, light suffering is producing for us an eternal weight of glory far beyond all comparison,";;;
(secret) Proverbs 25:9 - "Argue your case with your neighbor, but do not reveal another's secret,";;;
(majesty) Psalm 21:5 - "Great is his glory in your salvation; honor and majesty you have conferred upon him.";;;
(birds) Genesis 1:20 - "And God said, 'Let the waters swarm with living creatures, and let birds fly above the earth across the expanse of the heavens.'";;;
(precious) 1 Peter 2:7 - "Now to you who believe, this stone is precious. But to those who do not believe, 'The stone the builders rejected has become the cornerstone.'";;;
(divided) Mark 3:24 - "If a kingdom is divided against itself, that kingdom cannot stand.";;;
(finding) Luke 7:10 - "Then the men who had been sent returned to the house and found the servant well.";;;
